<div id="main" class="col-md-9" role="main">

# rxclassR

<div class="section level1">

define client functions for NIH rxclass API

</div>

</div>

<div id="main" class="col-md-9" role="main">

# Package index

<div class="section level2">

## All functions

</div>

<div class="section level2">

-   `getclass()` : given rxcui, produce a list from rxclass 'byRxcui'
-   `getcodesNOURISHbase()` : helper in channing system
-   `getpath()` : decode a classid and provide information on the
    hierarchy in which it is included
-   `setsumm()` : provide a summary for a set of Rx codes that might
    represent a patient's profile
-   `summ()` : produce a summary from a getclass collection

</div>

</div>

<div id="main" class="col-md-9" role="main">

# Articles

<div class="section">

### All vignettes

<div class="section-desc">

</div>

-   [rxclassR: use the NIH rxclass API for drug
    classification](https://github.com/vjcitn/rxclassR/articles/rxclassR.md):

</div>

</div>
